0011001000100010 0101110110000010 1 -> sum: 1000111110100101, cout: 0
1000000011101000 0011111010001011 0 -> sum: 1011111101110011, cout: 0
1101111100000001 1100100101110110 0 -> sum: 1010100001110111, cout: 1
0010000000111010 1110010101110011 1 -> sum: 0000010110101110, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
